definition: lit. to dig up the root/to get to the heart of (the matter)
carpenter's plane/to plane (woodwork)/to shave off/to peel (with a potato peeler etc)
variant of 刨[bao4]
to dig/to excavate/(coll.) to exclude/not to count/to deduct/to subtract
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
to dig up roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
erhua variant of 刨根[pao2 gen1]

sentences.english: The amounts they sent were smaller, the notes that accompanied them more inquisitive.
sentences.chinese: 这些学生寄来的钱很少，附上的短信更加刨根问底。

sentences.english: I do not like probing is probably really not much reason.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢刨根问底的，是也许真的没有太多的理由。

sentences.english: Time Aituoao will also have will speak insincerely , the people inconvenience to get to the root.
sentences.chinese: 埃托奥也会有言不由衷时候，人们不便去刨根问底。

sentences.english: He asked fundamental questions of human existence.
sentences.chinese: 他对于人类的存在刨根问底。

sentences.english: Women like to hash things out, talking issues through from start to finish.
sentences.chinese: 女人们喜欢刨根问底，将问题从头到尾说清楚。

sentences.english: You will need to do a lot of research if you wish to get to the bottom of things.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想刨根问底，则需要做大量的“调研”工作。

definition: to trace sth back to its source/to get to the bottom of sth
lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
to dig up roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
to get to the heart of the matter
lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
to track sth to its roots
to go to the bottom of things (idiom)
pinyin: da3 po4 sha1 guo1 wen4 dao4 di3

definition: lit. to examine roots and inquire at the base (idiom); to get to the bottom of sth
to reveal the inside story/to expose sb's secrets
to investigate (sth) thoroughly/to get to the bottom of
to pursue sth back to its origins/to trace back to the source/to get to the bottom of sth
to trace sth back to its origin
the king looked left and right and then talked of other things/to digress from the topic of discussion (idiom)
pinyin: wang2 gu4 zuo3 you4 er2 yan2 ta1

definition: to dredge
see 追根究底[zhui1 gen1 jiu1 di3]
